title: 求个BC端的标语插件
author: MC-骨灰
txt_content: 求个BC端的标语插件就是motd~~求{:10_494:}

replies.author: Kigmaidou
linevil
replies.txt_content:
你好 这里有一款 SP 社区的BC端MOTD插件

MotdAnimated | SpigotMC - High Performance Minecraft
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/motdanimated.7738/

是免费版的

replies.author: MC-骨灰
replies.txt_content:
